body:
Hey guys! So today, 29 March is the day that I born 15 years algo on Antofagasta, Chile.

Imo on Internet am Toxic with people or situations that I dont care, But irl im quite friendly and much more serious :P
When I finished school, I plan to study Medicine on U de Chile and then specialize on Infectology ( about 10 years lol ).

I have been playing mc about 3 - 4 years, Im actually Leader of Ethernal Cross and we hope we won TM3 :P

Ask away! I'll reply all the questions..
